inn1.comm: on a length outside off. Left alone by Rohit.
rank delivery from Jarvis. This one is short and wide and immediately given as wide by the umpire. Jarvis still loosening up it seems.
better line and length from Jarvis. This one closer to the batsman on a fifth stump line, pitched fuller, and Rohit leaves it alone
beautiful delivery from Jarvis. Pitches outside off just short of a length. Draws in Rohit who ends up leaving it alone as he presents the bat. Just shaves past the edge
Good leave from Rohit. Pitched outside off stump, coming in a little bit so there is some movement off the pitch. Very tight delivery though. Tidy stuff from Jarvis
full and on off stump. Rohit gets forward to block it out
short of a length just outside off stump. Rohit plays this to third man for a single

Got him first ball! Vitori pitches this full and just outside off stump. Rohit has a drive but ends up getting an edge which carries through to Vusi Sibanda at second slip. Rohit is out for 1. Let the No-hit comments begin.
full and pitched on leg stump. Kohli happy to work this away with a clip through the leg side.
full and wide outside off stump. Dhawan gets forward and tries to squeeze this through cover, but unable to get significant bat on it, and the ball goes harmlessly to the off siide
better length from Vitori. Fuller length outside off stump and Dhawan defends back to the bowler
Lovely outswinger from Vitori! On a length outside off stump, Dhawan is drawn in, and before he lays bat on ball the ball deviates away from the bat and through to the keeper.
On a length and Dhawan blocks it to the bowler
pitched outside off stump on a length. Kohli defends back to the bowler
wide delivery, pitched short of a length. Kohli decides to leave it alone
pitched full and outside off stump. Kohli eases onto the front foot and plays an exquisite cover drive which beats the inner field. Great shot!
Ohh close one! This one pitches just on off stump and short of a length. Kohli defends on the back foot and induces an edge, which falls just short of first slip
pitched on a fuller length outside off stump. Kohli happy to watch this through to the keeper
bad delivery from Jarvis. He strays onto the leg stump with a fuller delivery, and Kohli waits on it before helping it along to the fine leg boundary
just short of a length outside off stump. Dhawan plays no shot

this one is pitched fuller and going down the leg side. Dhawan glances it just behind square and it almost carries to the boundary before Malcolm Waller dives and flicks the ball back into the field of play. Great fielding effort!
on a length on middle and off. Kohli plays it back to the bowler
fuller length outside off and Kohli gets forward to defend to the off side
fuller delivery pitched on a leg stump line. Kohli tries to clip it through midwicket but ends up finding short square leg
short delivery pitched outside off stump. Kohli leaves this alone.
short delivery angling past off stump. Dhawan puts hit bat out but reins it in as the ball carries to the keeper

And Dhawan is out! Almost a carbon copy of the last delivery as this is pitched just short of a length angling past the off stump. Dhawan again hangs his bat, but is unable to bring it back in as the ball hits the edge and carries to slip. But hold on, there is a twist in the tale as instant replay shows that Jarvis has overstepped, which may mean the decision will be reversed. Some deliberation from the third umpire. It has been confirmed. Jarvis has bowled a front foot no ball, which means not only do Zimbabwe lose out on the wicket, but have to sustain a free hit as well

Jarvis pitches a yorker length delivery on leg stump, good idea but gets the line wrong, and even though Dhawan has a swipe to work it away to the leg side, but it ends up being called a no ball. What is Jarvis doing? Free hit once again
Jarvis, trying to compensate, ends up pitching a full toss outside off and Dhawan helps himself with a sumptuous cover drive for four
pitches full and on off stump, right in the slot, and Dhawan obliges with another cover drive through the gap. Jarvis losing the plot here
pitches this full and wide of off stump. Dhawan squeezes it through the slip region, and the ball is gathered by third man
on a length outside off and Kohli defends to mid off
short of length ball speared in on the middle and leg stump, Dhawan tucks it to square leg
back of a length delivery and on middle stump, Dhawan nudges it to short mid wicket and hares across for a single
on a length and wide outside off stump. Kohli in position to drive this through extra cover, but ends up finding the fielder
beautiful delivery from Vitori. Pitches this on middle and off and gets it shape in to the batsman, just passing the edge of Kohli's bat to the keeper
full and outside off. Kohli leaves this alone.

short and outside off stump. Kohli, looking to play this to the leg side, gets a top edge which spoons to the extra-cover region, but evades the grasp of two Zimbabwe fielders who are chasing after it. Narrow escape from the Indian captain
full and on leg stump. Kohli clips this square, and almost carries to the boundary, but is pushed back in by the fielder

on a length on middle and off. Kohli tries to play through midwicket, and ends up spooning to Waller, who takes a catch. Kohli stands his ground and Malcolm Waller signals for a review from the umpire as it appears that the ball may have bounced before he took the catch. Just awaiting confirmation from the umpire. Hold on, it is out, and Kohli is walking back to the pavilion. It looked like it had not carried, but the umpires must have seen something that we didn't. Kohli is incensed as he walks back. This one will be talking point, that is certain.
No ball again from Jarvis. Given as a free hit
Pitches on a length outside off stump. Rayudu tries to whack this through the offside but does not get enough bat on it.
on a length outside off stump. Defended by Rayudu to the offside
full and on off stump. Rayudu defends to short mid off
full and just outside off. Shapes in a bit as the ball passes the bat.
short and angling down the pads. Dhawan works it to long leg for a single
good length ball and it straightens a tad on middle stump, Rayudu pats it to mid on
short and going past the off stump. Rayudu happy to watch this through to the keeper.
wide delivery from Vitori as he gets his line wrong.
on a length going wide of off stump. Rayudu lets this one go.
overpitched and on off stump. Rayudu tries to work it through midwicket, but finds the fielder
short ball going past off stump. Rayudu lets it go through to the keeper
full and angling past the off stump. Dhawan gets forward to defend but the ball shapes away from the bat and to the keeper

droppedvery full delivery just outside off stump. Dhawan is forward to drive it and ends up inducing an edge which carries at a comfortable height to Taylor, but he ends up spilling it. This one looked regulation. Bad miss by the Zimbabweans
And Jarvis has pulled a Steven Finn! As he completes his action, Jarvis knocks the non-strikers stump on the way, and its called a no ball, but no free hit
pitches wide and full. Dhawan able to squeeze it square for a single
on a length just outside off stump and Rayudu happy to let it through to the keeper.
overpitched on middle and Rayudu finally gets off the mark with a clip through midwicket for three runs.
full and wide and Dhawan happy to leave it alone. Must be thinking about that let-off from Taylor.
short of a length on middle and Rayudu nudges it to the leg side
pitches on a length outside off and Rayudu lets it through to the keeper
short of a length on middle and leg. Rayudu defends to the leg side
short delivery on middle and Rayudu bends back to evade the delivery.

dropped pitched full and on off stump. Rayudu plays this uppishly, with the intention of going over the bowler's head, but misjudges as it carries at a decent height and Vitori sticks out his hands to grab at it, but ends up deflecting it to the midwicket region. Vitori is now getting some treatment from the Zimbabwe team physio.
wide delivery pitched short of a length and angling down the pads. Another wide from the Zimbabwe bowlers.
on a length on leg stump and seems to square up Rayudu, with the ball carrying square on the offside
full and going past the off stump. Left alone by Dhawan.
full and wide of off stump. Once again left alone.
full and angling past the off stump. Dhawan content to let it go through.
short of a length and outside off stump. Dhawan lets it go through. Jarvis getting some extra bounce.
on a length and pitched outside off stump. Dhawan shuffles down the track and plays through the gap in extra-cover
pitches on a length angling away from off stump. Dhawan blocks it to the offside.
pitched on a length outside off stump. Rayudu in Test mode and lets it through.
short and on middle and leg. Rayudu gets back to defend to the offside.
rank delivery from Vitori. Pitches short and wide down the leg side. Signalled wide by the umpire.
short of a length on middle and off. Ball carries through to the keeper.
short delivery on middle stump and Rayudu works this to the cover region for a quick single.
short and wide from Vitori. Exaggerated bounce from Vitori. Left alone by Dhawan.
pitches short and angling down the pads. Dhawan glances this behind square for a single.
starts off with an offside wide.
better line from Chatara. Stiffened appeal from the Zimbabwe fielders as the ball hits the pads, but it looks high
Dhawan plays this to cover for a single.
pitches on a length angling into the batsman. Rayudu dead bats this to the offside for a single.
fuller length from Chatara and Dhawan defends it to the offside
lovely angled delivery from Chatara as it goes past off stump to the keeper
short of a length and Dhawan plays it to the offside for none
starts the over with a leg-side wide
that was shortish and well outside off, Rayudu throws his bat at that and misses, was a hit-me ball

Rayudu's struggles are over, his feet didn't move as he looks to lash a ball outside off through the cover, ends up giving a soft catch to the man at cover, he had looked in good touch in his debut innings, but was far less fluent today
even Brian Vitori starts with a short ball to Raina, whose troubles against that are widely documented, Raina slugs that towards square leg
another short ball,Vitori grunts with the effort as he bowls that, Dhawan ducks under
length ball on middle and leg, defended down the track towards the bowler
back of a length ball just outside off, tapped towards cover to end the over
Raina reaches to a wide length ball angled across him and places it between extra cover and mid off to get off strike
banged in short, comes slowly off the pitch, Dhawan abandons the pull as the ball loops down the leg side
pushed in front of midwicket
reaches out again and pings extra cover with the drive
nudged square off the pad but there is a fielder at square leg and no single coming
good length, right on off, defended
he's reaching for these deliveries going across and driving them crisply, to extra cover again
starts with a straight length ball down the leg side to the left-hander
on the pads, worked behind square leg
leans forward and drives a pitched up ball to mid off
turned off the pad, square leg dives and prevents the run
on the pads once again this over, worked to fine leg
comes forward and defends down the pitch
shortish, he opened up initially thinking of the pull probably, but it came off slowly and he ended up blocking
pitched up but on the pads, flicked to fine leg
angled across, he takes a step forward and pulls bat out of the way
pitches good length and skids down the leg side, extras keep piling up
pitched up for the drive outside off and he does, out to the sweeper
Raina's gone now, India in more trouble, this length delivery set to be heading down leg again, before Raina tried to nudge it fine, and the keeper took a sharp take
some pressure on Dinesh Karthik, who is a touch short of rune,s he starts by defending towards point
beaten outside off this time, the ball swerves away after pitching and Karthik is left fishing for it outside off
ooh, that was close, superb delivery from Chigumbura, just a hint of movement still there, Dhawan opens the face looking to run it down, beaten
shorter and around off stump, defended towards point
well-judged single, Dhawan played that shortish ball with soft hands, dropping the ball to the off side, immediately sets off, Karthik responds swiftly
full ball angling in towards the pads, Karthik blocks it towards midwicket and takes another single, India need more of these to ease the pressure
short of length ball heading down the leg side, off the pads and towards fine leg
on leg stump once more, Dhawan looking ungainly as he tucks that towards square leg
full ball on the pads, driven crisply towards midwicket by Dhawan
a direct hit and that could have been five down. Dhawan hit it firmly towards mid-off but still wants the single, he had to put his skates on for that, just beating that throw
outside off and Karthik is happy to shoulder arms
length ball around off stump, defended off the front foot towards cover
length ball outside off and Karthik raises the bat over his head as he allows the ball through
closer to off, a touch shorter but doesn't tempt Karthik into playing
slanting across outside off, Dhawan happy to shoulder arms
length ball on leg stump, Dhawan is comfortable but not exactly elegant as he nudges that towards midwicket
a half-volley on the leg stump, whipped towards deep square leg
shortish and outside off, Karthik hasn't not been drawn into playing these sort of deliveries so far, briefly flirts with it before withdrawing his bat
Chatara gets the ball to seam in, starts too wide outside off to be a real worry
keeps it well outside off, Karthik is happy to allow it through to the keeper
short of length ball on leg stump, defended to the leg side
another quick single, length ball outside off is dabbed towards cover
full ball angling in towards off, pushed just wide of extra cover for a far more comfortable singl
short ball on leg stump, Dhawan swivels as he pulls that down towards fine leg, wasn't looking to power that one, just guides it along
a confident leave from Karthik outside off, steps forward decisively and raises the bat over his head as he lets that go
again well outside off, Karthik isn't interested
angles across outside off, Dhawan wants to drive that through cover but is beaten
pitched up and close to off stump, Dhawan keeps bat and pad close as he blocks to the right of the bowler
short ball and the angles takes it too wide outside off
not as short as the previous one, and not as far outside off either, Dhawan leaves
pitched up and on off stump, defended towards midwicket and a quick single is taken
slanting in towards middle, glanced towards fine leg for one more
pitched up and on the pads, tapped towards square leg
short ball on leg stump, a fierce pull from Dhawan sends that in the air just behind square leg and a dive from the man at long leg can't stop that from reaching the rope
length ball outside off this time, gracefully works that through the off for a single
full ball is driven towards sweeper cover for one more
defended back towards the bowler
back of a length and outside off, helped towards point, batsmen think of a tight single but there isn't time, fielder fires in the throw and the man backing up can't collect, four overthrows there
very expensive over this, full and on the pads, easy to help that down to the fine-leg boundary
Utseya from round the wicket, on off stump, defended to the off side off the front foor
length ball is driven towards extra cover
careful defence off the front foot, Utseya keeping it steady around off
some turn there for Utseya, more defence
tucks this towards square leg
not a maiden, that was on leg stump, Karthi skips down the track and pushes it towards mid-on for a single
well outside off and Karthik remains patient

short ball just outside off, Karthik latches on to that, pulled away towards deep midwicket, Raza makes plenty of ground to get to that one, nearly messes it up after a dive as he palms the ball on to his chest, but he does well to scoop it away from the rope before his feet touch the boundary
length ball on middle stump, defended back towards the bowler
length ball on leg stump, defended toward square leg by Dhawan
a wide down the leg side
a low full toss outside off stump, and that is easy for Karthik, he gets well forward and drives past extra cover, makes sure he gets the placement right and doesn't try to muscle the ball though
well outside off and that is sliced behind point for a single
on the pads, a wristly stroke sends the ball towards deep square leg
overpitched and on leg stump, nudged behind square leg for one more
full ball outside off, driven towards cover after charging out, can't place it correctly
a bit of width outside off, this time he takes care to place that past cover, drives it inside out, not much power behind that
gets well forward and jabs the ball towards midwicket
looks for a reverse-sweep, struck on the helmet as he misses that outside off
pitched up and on the pads, Dhawan whips that away towards square leg for a boundary to bring up his half-century, a chancy knock but he has stuck it out
pushed down the ground for a single
full ball on middle and leg, clipped towards midwicket
keeps straying onto the pads, tucked to square leg for one more
full ball outside off, punched towards mid-off and another quick single taken
short of length ball on leg stump, again the wrong line, eased down to short fine leg for one more
length ball on middle stump, Utseya bowling from round the stumps, defended
reverse-sweep from Karthik, picks that fullish ball from outside leg and sends that behind point for four
on the pads, watchfully worked towards square leg for a single
crisply drives that towards extra cover
length ball on middle, drives along the ground towards long-on for a single
short of a length and wide. Karthik plays this to third man for a couple
eased to short cover
full and on middle and off, defended back to the bowler
on a length on middle and angling towards off. Dhawan tries to sweep it square but unable to get enough bat on ball
fuller and on middle stump. Dhawan defends to the bowler.
full and on middle. Dhawan steers it through midwicket for a single
speared in full and going down the legside. Dhawan adjusts to get some bat on it but finds the square leg fielder
push-driven to long off
on a length on leg stump. Karthik happy to work this away to the leg side for a single
full and outside off. Dhawan steers this to third man for a couple.
full and on off. Dhawan presses forward to defend to the offside.
on a length outside off stump. Karthik gets deep in the crease to work this away to third man for a single.
on a length angling past the off stump. Chips out and defends the length ball to long off
pitches on a length onto the pads. Karthik tries to work it away to the leg side, but to no avail
short and going down the pads. Karthik gets forward to sweep and is able to scurry for a quick single
full and pitched wide of off stump. Dhawan drives it through extra-cover for a single.
full and on off stump. Dhawan drives this down the ground for a single.
full and on off stump. Dhawan drives this down the ground for a single.
full and on middle and leg. Karthik on drives this for a single through midwicket
single to point
on a length outside off, turning in. Karthik forward to defend.
a little shorter on the same line. Karthik dances down the ground and works this through midwicket for a single.
pitched on a length outside off and Karthik is able to steer it to third man for a single.
short of a length and outside off stump. Dhawan plays it to cover for a single.
short of a length on middle and leg. Karthik plays this under his eyes to midwicket for a quick single
on a length and on middle. Dhawan drives to long-off for a single
short delivery on middle and leg. Karthik plays a pull shot, but doesn't time it well, and is able to scamper for a single.
on a length angling past of the off stump. Dhawan walks down and drives through cover for a single to long-off.
wide and outside off, on a fuller length. Dhawan tries to drill this square through the offside but is unable to get any bat on it.
full and on off stump. Dhawan gets under it and heaves it over the extra-cover region, but manages to miss the fielder. Dhawan's good luck continues
back of a length outside off and it sharply turns it. Karthik works it away to the leg side for a single.
full and wide outside off stump. Dhawan cuts it square and gets a single.
back of a length pitched outside off, but this one turns almost past the leg side. But given a wide by the umpire. Looks like a harsh call.
fuller and on off stump. Karthik tries to work it away legside but finds short square leg
full and pitched wide of off stump. Dhawan gets forward and drives through extra-cover
short of a length outside off stump. Straightens at the last moment and carries through to the keeper
again pitches outside off and Karthik gets pad on it for a leg-bye
on a length pitched wide of off stump. Dhawan cuts this to the square fielder.
overpitched delivery outside off. Karthik drives it through cover but finds silly mid off
short of a length on off stump. Dhawan glances this square for a single.
wide and outside off stump on a fuller length. Dhawan attempts a reverse-sweep, but is unable to get bat on ball
What are Zimbabwe doing! Bowls this full and on off stump. Dhawan goes for a lofted sweep and luckily misses the boundary rider on the square boundary for a four. Went right through his hands.
full and outside off. Dhawan works this square for a single.
full and Dhawan sweeps this to short fine leg
wide and outside off stump. Fuller length. Dhawan plays this to extra-cover for a single
short of a length on middle and off. Dhawan dances down and plays it through cover
pitched on a length outside off stump. Karthik gets forward to defend
short of a length on off and middle. Karthik hooks this to the fine leg , and manages to beat the fielder to the boundary.
short of a length outside off. Karthik steers this to third man.
overpitched and outside off. Dhawan waits on the front foot before hoicking this over midwicket for a six. Lovely finish as he eases through the shot.
full and wide of off stump. Dhawan tries to squeeze this past backward point, but to no avail.
on a length outside off stump. Dhawan cuts square and runs hard enough to complete two.
fuller outside off stump. Dhawan squeezes it past third man for a single.
full and on off and middle. Karthik gets forward to play an on drive through midwicket. Able to complete two runs.
full and going down the pads. Karthik finds the fielder at short midwicket
back of a length outside off. Dhawan steers to sweeper cover

full delivery on the pads and Karthik gets forward to sweep this to fine leg for a boundary. Karthik also gets his 50 off 64 balls. Good innings from the Tamil Nadu bat. His second fifty since his return to the ODI fold
on a length on off stump. Dhawan gets forward to defend to the off side.
on a length going past the off stump. Dhawan dead bats this to the offside for a quick single.
on a length outside off. Karthik defends to short mid off.
on a length on middle and leg. Karthik gets deep before playing a slog sweep in the fine leg region over short fine leg. Wants two but is sent back by Dhawan.
loopy full toss outside off and Dhawan gets bat on it to complete a single through to long leg
full and on off stump. Karthik angles his bat to find short third man for a quick single.
short and outside off, turning in. Karthik dances down and heaves this over the midwicket region for a boundary.
played to to deep extra cover
driven towards mid-off for a single
a touch short from Utseya and too far outside off, slapped hard for four by Dhawan
beaten outside off by the turn
short of a length on middle and leg. Karthik pulls this to deep midwicket for a single.
fuller delivery going past the off stump. Dhawan drives this straight to mid-off
back of a length outside off. Dhawan works this away through extra-cover for a pair, and completes a well-deserved century. His first since the Champions Trophy match against the West Indies.
full ball on middle stump, flicked to deep midwicket for two runs.
length ball just outside off. Mistimed punch to cover for none.
rank full toss delivery delivered wide of off stump. Karthik tries to whack this straight down the ground, but mistimes, and is stopped by long-off
back of a length on middle going past leg. Dhawan steps back to make space, but misses the ball, and the ball narrowly misses the leg stump on its way to the keeper. The many lives of Shikhar Dhawan!
pitched full and outside off stump. Dhawan steps into the delivery before playing a nice pick up shot over backward square leg for a six.
short of a length on middle and leg. Dhawan dances down before working this through extra-cover for a single.
short of a length on middle and off stump. Karthik steers this to short third man for a single.
short of a length outside off stump. Dhawan pulls this fiercely through midwicket for another boundary. Dhawan opening up here.

pitched short of a length, but doesn't bounce as much as expected. Karthik plays a manufactured swivel-pull over short fine leg but is unable to get enough impetus into the shot, and is reined in by said fielder

short of a length on middle and off. Dhawan tries to play square but doesn't get enough bat and goes for a quick single with Karthik running to the danger end. Taylor is able to pick up and throw from his end and run out Karthik.
short and wide of off stump. Jadeja's innings begins with a wide from Chatara.
short and outside off. Jadeja has a wild swipe at it, but the ball carries harmlessly to the fielder
full and outside off. Jadeja steers this through third man for a single.
played to extra cover
full and outside off. Jadeja works this past point.
two runs to sweeper cover

short of a length going down legside, yet Dhawan managed to drag it on to his stumps as he attempted to sweep down the leg side. His luck finally ran out, that too, ironically, through his own doing. Interesting as Zimbabwe have made it difficult for him to get out, despite the chances. But a brilliant hundred from the Indian opener nonetheless
on middle stump line and Mishra gets off the mark straight away
pitches on a length and spins sharply away. Jadeja content to let it go through to the keeper.
pitched on middle and off and Jadeja drives this to cover for a single.
full and outside off stump and Jadeja finds mid off
full and pitched outside off. Jadeja steers through the cover region again, and this time is able to pick up a single.
back of a length outside off, Amit Mishra was a little squared up, defends it to point
short of a length and outside off. Mishra drives through extra-cover and almost finds the boundary but the fielder is able to stop it with a dive head first.
loopy full delivery outside off. Jadeja squeezes this to the point region for a single.
loopy full toss outside the off stump and is wided by the umpire
another wide delivery, and Mishra steps into it and plays a ramp shot over short fine leg for an improvised boundary.
length ball is defended back to the bowler
pitched up and on middle and leg, punched towards mid-on
length ball on off stump, from round the wicket, blocked
gets on the front foot and defends again

some terrible cricket from India here, after only run in the over so far, Mishra decides to go for a big swing, a thick edge sends the ball swirling between the keeper and short third man, Jadeja races back for the third, Mishra hadn't wanted it initially, he has to go for it though, the throw is wide but still there's enough time to comfortably run out Mishra
length ball around off stump, defended off the front foot towards cover
opens the face and guides the ball towards deep point
full and outside off, slashed towards cover
a low full toss from outside off, thumped towards long-off
a low swinging yorker, heading for off stump, defended by Vinay to the right of the bowler
full ball from round the stumps, well outside off, squeezed towards backward point
what a hit that is, serious power from Jadeja as he hammers that along the ground, back past the bowler
drops it short, Jadeja gets back and pushes it towards mid-on
thick inside-edge as he looks to drive that, a French cut towards short fine leg, Jadeja was always pushing for the single though the ball went straight to the fielder, makes it comfortably
a full toss on the pads, chipped over Vitori at midwicket for a couple
defend towards midwicket tis time
length ball outside off, Jadeja is out of the crease as he pushes that to the right of the bowler, not wide enough to get a run

a superb yorker from Jarvis, Vinay gets bat on it but the ball doesn't roll off the track even, Jarvis charges through to field, Jadeja was too quick so Jarvis has to fire at the non-striker's end, he misses and the man backing up also misses, an overthrow
short of length and outside off, looks to chop that behind point, misses
length ball outside off, slapped towards point

painful blow there, not for the batsman but for the non-striker, a yorker gone wrong, ends up as a full toss, Jadeja latches on to it and crashes it down the ground towards Vinay, who punches it away to prevent bodily harm, he's wringing his hand in pain
squeezed out towards backward point for a single
here's the boundary India were searching for, Vinay makes room and carves that inside out towards sweeper cover for four
drops it short, should have been put away by Jadeja, who muscles that away but only as far as deep midwicket, perfectly picks out the fielder there

a full ball outside leg stump, Vinay backs away from the stumps and launches that over the bowler's head, for a moment it seemed that there would be another catch, but it is too straight for either long-on or long-off
another boundary for Vinay here, a length ball that is crashed to the deep extra cover boundary
power, Vinay Kumar perhaps a trifle miffed at seeing Amit Mishra sent ahead of him in the batting order, charges out and hammers a brutal flat hit over long-off for six
skips down the track and taps it to the off side for a single

the carnage continues as Mohammad Shami absolutely pounds that one, a length delivery that was in the slot, launched high by Shami and long enough to clear the long-on rope, so despite losing Jadeja on the first ball of the over, India pillage 23 off the over to reach a formidable 294

inn2.comm: on a length bang on off stump. Sibanda defends to the bowler
full delivery on leg stump. Digged out by Sibanda.
short of a length on off stump, with some movement into the batsman. Sibanda defends that off the back foot rather awkwardly, as the ball seemed to hit on the underside of the elbow.
short ball going down the leg side. Sibanda charges down the track and pulls this fiercely through midwicket with a lofted shot that finds the boundary.
short of a length on leg stump. Sibanda unable to get bat on it.
short ball again on middle and leg. Sibanda quick to pounce on it as he pulls off the back foot to the midwicket boundary, this time along the ground.
lovely outswinger on a length outside off. Raza content to leave it alone.
on a length drifting down the pads. Raza able to work it behind square and runs hard for two. A direct throw would have got Sibanda out as he labours to make his ground.
on a length angling down the pads and Raza is able to glance it to mid on for a quick single. Living a little dangerously here Zimbabwe. Looks like they are going to make a feast of the chase.
short of a length outside off. Left alone by Sibanda.
brings this one in closer and on a length just outside off. Sibanda defends off the back foot, but finds the fielder in the inner circle.
pitched on a length just outside off. Ball shapes in and just narrowly misses the off stump. Ambitious, but good leave in the end from Sibanda.
full and outside off. Raza squeezes this square through backward point for a single.
short of a length outside off. Sibanda shoulders arms.
short ball on middle and Sibanda advances down the wicket in an attempt to throw Vinay off his length. But ends up inside edging on to his pads and the ball lands harmlessly in the offside.
on a length outside off stump. Sibanda leaves it alone.
beautiful outswinger from Vinay. Line just outside off on a good length. Squares up Sibanda as the ball carries to the keeper. That is the line he should be going for.
on a length outside off stump.
full and on the pads. Ahmed hits Raza's pads and goes up but there was definite bat on it. The appeal is turned down by the umpire.
full and on middle and leg. Raza advances a step and then bludgeons through the extra-cover region with a lofted shot for four.
on a length angling down the pads. Raza works it away behind square for a single.
bouncer that goes straight through to the keeper
well bowled by Shami Ahmed! It was a back of length delivery outside off, Sibanda gets forward to drive but gets beaten
short ball on middle and leg. Sibanda steps into the shot and plays a pickup shot through square leg for a boundary. Lovely shot from Sibanda!
short ball outside off and Raza cuts this over the inner circle for a square boundary.
length ball outside off. Carries straight to the keeper.
short ball outside off. Raza lets it go through to the keeper.
back of a length outside off. Raza dead bats this to short mid off for a quick single.
short ball outside off. Sibanda plays this straight to third man but unable to get a run.
fuller length delivery on off, Sibanda comes on the front foot and defends it to covers
on a length drifting down the pads. Raza attempts a glance but unable to get bat on it. Ends up being called a wide by the umpire.
short outside off and Raza tries to cut it but ends up almost playing on. Ball lands harmlessly away from the stumps.
short and outside off. Raza dead bats this one and goes for a quick run, Ravindra Jadeja swoops on to it and hits the striker's end stumps.
on a length on off stump. Sibanda defends to the offside.
on a length outside off. Sibanda hangs his bat in the air, but luckily escapes the edge.
short of a length outside off. Sibanda angles his bat to third man for a couple.
on a length outside off, with the ball seaming in appreciably. Hits Sibanda's front pad and immediately the Indians go up, but the umpire is not having any of it.
on a length on middle and off and almost cuts Raza in two.
fuller length outside off. Raza unable to work this away.
length ball outside off. Raza defends to the offside.
short and on middle and off. Raza defends off the back foot.
on a length pitched on middle and leg. Unadkat is getting some swing and Raza is having difficulty working him away. Almost a maiden over with just one delivery left.
lovely change-up! surprises Raza with a bouncer as Raza falls under rather haphazardly. Great opening over from the young left-armer.
on a length outside off and Sibanda waits before playing this through the slip region for a single to third man.
short of a length drifting down the pads. Raza unable to get bat on it and ends up being 4 leg-byes to the boundary.
short ball outside off. Raza tries a wild swish to cut over the square boundary on the offside, but is unable to get bat on ball.
another short delivery outside off stump and Raza attempts to hit it through extra-cover with a cross-batted whack, but instead finds the mid-off fielder
short of a length outside off. Raza trying to work this on the offside and almost drags on. Ends up getting a single after the ball carries to short fine leg.
on a length outside off stump. Sibanda tries a drive on the up, but the ball carries to the keeper.
length ball pitched outside off. Raza drives on the up through extra-cover for a well-timed boundary. This was a more authoritative shot from Raza, who struggled against Unadkat in his first over.
length ball outside off. Raza defends to the offside.
short of a length outside off. Raza tries to work it away to the offside for a quick single, but finds short mid-off and aborts the single.
a length ball on middle and off. Raza falls over this one as he tries to play across his front pad, ball crashes into his thigh guard. Raza's technique is being tested here.
similar delivery expect a more leg stump line. This time Raza is able to glance it to backward square for a couple.
pitches on a length outside off. Raza finds the fielder at point.
flighted delivery on off, Sibanda defends it on the frontfoot. Given no ball by the umpire as there were not enough fielders inside the circle
Sibanda defends on the front foot
flighted delivery on off, Sibanda comes on the frontfoot and pushes it to long off
tossed up on off, Sikandar Raza gets forward and pushes it to covers
flighted delivery on the stumps, Sikandar Raza gets forward and punches it back to the bowler
length ball angling down the off side. Sibanda content to let this go through to the keeper.
short of a length and drifting down the pads. Sibanda glances to the leg side for a single.
length delivery on off, Sikandar Raza comes forward and pushes it back to the bowler

short of a length and Raza goes for a pull, but ends up hitting it off the bottom edge and spooning up to Shikhar Dhawan, who ran from square leg to midwicket who completes a fine diving catch. Short and wide, but Unadkat has managed to pick up a wicket, and the first blow for Zimbabwe in this chase.
short of length delivery outside off, Sibanda gets back and cuts it to point
flatter delivery outside off, Masakadza comes forward and taps it to cover
on a length outside off. Sibanda steers to extra-cover for a single.
on a length outside off, Sibanda drives through the square region on the offside for a single
pitches outside off again and this time Masakadza drives through cover
pitches outside off and Sibanda finds the mid-off fielder
pitches on a length outside off. Left alone by the batsman.
short of a length on middle and leg. Hamilton works it away to the leg side.
short ball on middle and off. Sibanda rocks back and pulls with authority through the midwicket region for a boundary.
short of a length angling past the off stump. Sibanda cuts to backward point for none.
on a length outside off. Sibanda steers this to third man.
pitches on a length wide of off stump. Hamilton allows it to go through to the keeper.
short of a length on middle and leg. Sibanda finds mid on
on a length on off stump. Sibanda defends to point.

short ball outside off and Sibanda advances down the track and attempts a cross-batted shot through the offside, but ends up getting a top edge with the ball flying over the keeper for a couple of bounces to the boundary rope.
short of a length on middle and leg. Sibanda defends it back.
short of a length on off stump. Sibanda tries to advance but ends up playing the ball back to the bowler.
short of a length on off stump. Sibanda blocks it to the offside.
length ball outside off. Hamilton, realising their is no fine leg, goes for a sweep through that region and picks up a couple.
length ball on middle and leg. Sibanda content to block it back to the bowler.

length ball on offstump. Sibanda shuffles down the track and plays a lofted shot over extra-cover, but almost finds the fielder on the boundary as Rayudu tries for a dive but is unable to get under it. Still stops a certain boundary.
flatter delivery outside off, Sibanda leaves it alone
length ball outside off. Sibanda tries to power through extra-cover, but finds the fielder.
pitches on a length outside off. Sibanda steers to sweeper cover for a single.
short of a length on middle and leg. Sibanda plays a lovely pick up over backward square leg and finds the boundary
loopy full delivery, almost a full toss, on off stump. Sibanda places this past mid-off for a boundary
length delivery on the stumps, Sibanda leans forward and works it to short mid wicket
fuller length outside off stump. Defended to the offside.
length ball on middle, worked away by Hamilton to the leg side.
pitches outside off stump and on a length. Sibanda steps into the shot and pulls this to square leg for a boundary.
keeps it on off, pushed towards short cover
length ball is blocked back towards the bowler
a touch short and outside off, chopped towards deep point
length ball on the legstump, tucked behind square leg
skips down and drives towards long-on, not exactly intentional, think he was looking to go through the off side
the googly spins towards the leg stump, helped towards short fine leg for a quick run
drags it short as the batsman lunges out, in the air as he defends that but it lands well short of the bowler
driven off the front foot towards short extra cover
Sibanda reaches 50 in grand style, a pitched up delivery is dragged from outside off over long-on for six, that was a muscular hit and the crowd in Harare love it
length ball spinning away outside off, dabbed in front of point
reverse-sweep attempted, misses and is struck on the body
dragged it down, but as always Jadeja keeps it on the stumps, defended to the off side
slides on to the pads, tucked to square leg
gets that away down towards fine leg, short fine has to give chase
flatter and heading for off stump, punched towards long-off for a single, sensible stuff this from Zimbabwe
eased to long-on for one more
length ball is driven crisply towards short extra cover
length ball on the pads, clipped towards midwicket
straighter one on off stump, pushed back to the bowler
flighted and full, just outside off, driven towards sweeper cover for an easy single to bring up the 100
missed stumping, Sibanda skipped down the track and the quicker one slides between bat and body, the keeper perhaps unsighted can't collect the ball and the chance to stump is missed
lbw appeal as he misses the googly, that was slipping down leg though

whoah, horrible delivery from Mishra, a nice high full toss, asking to be put away, Masakadaza obliges, choosing deep midwicket, sends that a long, long way over the rope, clears the tents beyond the rope before landing, the Harare crowd has certainly found its voice

first ball of a new spell and Unadkat has struck, Sibanda has thrown it away, he was looking to loft a short of length delivery over midwicket, but his weak drive ends up as an overhead catch to the man there, the partnership is broken and Unadkat gets his second
pitched up and angling across, left alone by Taylor, he's Zimbabwe's best batsman but hasn't been in the best form in recent times
looking to poke that towards the off side, edges it onto the body and the ball rolls to the off side

is that a run-out, that will be a senseless loss for Zimbabwe if it is, the ball dropped off Taylor's pads and rolled along the pitch, Taylor set off for a run, there was never a run there, Masakadza knows that and sends back Taylor, who races back along with Unadkat, Taylor dives but Unadkat's under-arm throw catches him short, and in a matter of minutes the wind has been knocked out of the Zimbabwe chase
outside edge sends the ball towards point
a casual leave from Masakadza as the ball seams in late towards the off stump
another leave, this time the ball was a bit wider outside off
short of length ball outside off, Masakadza stabs that towards backward point and calls "yes, yes, yes" before taking the single
short of length ball on off stump, Williams gets behind the line and defends to the off side
pitched up this time, Williams remains on the back foot as he defends awkwardly to the off side
short of length again, tight line around off, blocked towards short cover
pitched up and just outside off, a fluent drive to mid-off, too well hit to have time for a single
angling across the batsman who is content to leave the ball through to the keeper
closer to the off stump, worked to the leg side for a couple
bouncer outside off, Masakadza thinks about the pull and then decides against the shot
Maskadza hoicks that pitched up delivery, that was in the air a long time, Dhawan raced across from deep midwicket but the ball lands well wide of him
drops the ball towards point for a single
dropped, tough chance for Suresh Raina at first slip, a genuine edge from Masakadza, goes low and to Raina's left, he extends his left hand and gets a palm on that but he can't latch on
carefully defended down the pitch
guided down towards third man for a single
short of length and seams in a touch, no room at all outside off, Masakadza manages to steer that down to third man
length ball angling into off stump from round the wicket, blocked back towards the bowler
a ferocious swat from Williams, not particularly well-timed, not the most elegant shot either, still he has put away that short ball towards the deep midwicket boundary to get two runs
that one spins away and rears up as well, Masakadza was looking to push that towards cover but is beaten after it pitches on off stump
dabs this to point

third umpire called for after Karthik takes off the bails, Masakadza wanted to thrash a ball spinning away outside off through the cover, he missed but the back foot was always in the crease, so he's fine
pushed towards point for a single
a muted lbw appeal as williams sweeps towards short fine
full ball turning away outside off, punched towards backward point
from round the wicket, spinning away outside off, poked behind point, if the fielder had hit the stumps at either end, the batsmen were struggling
over the wicket now, down the leg side
looking to sweep that, not quite off the middle but he gets it past short fine
goes for the reverse-sweep this time, well-controlled but can't beat short third man
another reverse-sweep, again the same fielder denies the run
slides straighter on, defended to the leg side
horror delivery yards outside legstump
Maskadza exposes his stumps by skipping way beyond leg stump, then chop the ball towards point

oh dear, the reverse-sweep doesn't come off, Jadeja as always fires it fairly straight and on the stumps, Williams misses, pitching on off and spinning just a touch towards leg, there's a massive appeal, the umpire takes his time to decide, the ball rolls wide of slip, Williams decides to chance a single, no way there was a single there, in any case the umpire lifts his finger signalling the lbw, otherwise he would have been run out
driven towards cover
blocked off the backfoot towards backward point
defended towards the covers
length ball outside off, a bit of width this time but the batsman lets the ball through to the keeper
wicket maiden for Jadeja as the batsman defends the final ball of the over off the front foot
short and wide outside off, slapped towards sweeper co ver
shortish ball on off stump, dabbed towards point by Waller
short ball outside off, Waller sways out of the line of that one
follows the batsman who was backing away from the stumps, Masakadza defends to midwicket
length ball angling down the leg side, Masakadza steps away from the stumps and pushes it towards cover

what a soft dismissal that was, that too from the set batsman, Masakadza has been tinkering with the sweep for a while now, once more he doesn't connect properly, the ball loops to short fine leg for a comfortable catch, Zimbabwe chase in tatters now
defends to the leg side
googly spins in towards off, defended from the crease to the off side
driven towards sweeper cover
pushed towards cover for a single
driven off the front foot towards point
length ball on off stump, defended to the off side
drags it short and on a middle stump line, Chigumbura spots it early and ducks under
short of length ball just outside off, defended towards cover

short of a length ball outside off, Chigumbura wanted to pull that away, seemed well poised to play the shot as well, but at the last moment he opted against playing it, allows the ball through to the keeper
short ball just outside off, Chigumbura weaves out of the line of that one
a waft outside off, this was back of a length and outside off, a nothing stroke and luckily for him there is no edge
turning away after pitching on off stump, defended off the back foot

another batsman falls going for the sweep, the googly once more does the job, he was late in playing the shot and the ball has almost spun past and struck him on the thigh, that was going on to take leg stump, huge lbw appeal and the umpire doesn't need much time to decide that's out
slides on towards middle and leg, defended off the back foot
flighted legbreak, starts too wide outside off to worry the batsman
on off stump and that is solidly blocked back
gets forward and defends towards short cover, two maidens in a row now, this match is O V E R
heading towards the off stump, punched off the back foot towards mid-off
length ball on off stump, defended back towards the bowler
spins away outside off, defended down the track again
pushes towards cover this time, another dot ball
loses his line now, slides down the leg side
a single to the off side this time
full ball on middle stump, worked towards midwicke
on off stump and that is punched towards extra cover
spinning away after pitching well outside off,driven towards cover
length ball turns away outside off, chopped past backwrd point, not the best bit of fielding in the circle, which means Rayudu has a long chase
too wide outside off and that is thrashed towards sweeper cover
spinning towards middle, watchful forward defence
flighted and full, a legbreak, gets the edge as the batsman looks to defend, the ball rolls down towards fine leg
pitched up and that is eased towards long-off for a single
length ball on off stump, no width at all from Jadeja, defended to the off side
ooh, that was so close to being bowled, he was looking drive a full ball through the off side, he misses it and it spins past the stumps and past the keeper
defended towrads mid-off this time
once again towards mid-off, no single though
full and flat, on the pads, glided to the fine-leg boundary, poor delivery from Jadeja to end the over

what an astonishing shot that is, Chigumbura take a bow, that was short and outside off, not much footwork there but he throws his bat at it, a flat-batted enormously powerful hit sends the ball sailing over long-off
defended off the back foot towards backward point
full and outside off, driven towards extra cover for no run
length ball on off stump,looked to defend down the track, he misses and is struck on the thigh, the ball pitched outside leg so not much of an lbw appeal
blocked to the leg side this time
another lbw appeal but that was sliding down the leg side, it was pitched up and caught the batsman on the crease
short of length ball outside off, guided down to third man for a single
length ball slanting in towards off stump, pushed towards the covers for a single
seaming in from outside off, dropped towards midwicket for a single
a full toss that should have been put away, smacked straight to mid-off, Shami gets away with that one
a fluent drive to the left of mid-off, a diving stop there
bouncer from Shami there, aimed at the body, the batsman was cramped up by it, he is hit on the handle and the ball then hits the helmet and drops at his feet
pitched up and on off stump, driven to mid-off
full and on the leg stump, flicked away to the square leg boundary, shows he's not all about powerful shots
full ball around off, driven straight to mid-off, a direct hit from Kohli and he would have been run out there
angling across from over the wicket, Utseya steers the ball down to third man
from round the wicket now, fires it in towards the stumps, tucked towards square leg
short of length ball on off stump, defended to the leg side off the front foot
full ball slanting in towards middle, defended back towards the bowler, that was a big inside-edge onto the pads before the ball rolled down the track
blocked towards point
tries the short ball, that was well outside off, batsman decides not to chase
low full toss heading for off stump, defended to the leg side this time
keeps it short, follows the batsman with that one, worked behind square leg
misses the yorker and it results in a low full toss on the pads, easily helped towards the long leg boundary
spins away after pitching just outside off, pushed towards cover for a single
flighted legbreak this time, careful forward defence
looks to drive through the off but he didn't see that flipper which went quicker
towards mid-off for a single
on the pads, can't put it away through the leg side
that dropped a touch short, it was the legspinner, Chigumbura waits on the back foot and carves that through extra cover for four
short of length ball on off stump, opens the face as he defends towards cover
that was heading for off stump, short of length ball is defended to the off side
a bit shorter this time, looks to pierce the gap around point but can't get it through, Utseya frustrated at the dot balls
no width at all from Vinay, just outside off, blocked to the off side
and again, he concentrates on the off stump, defended back to the bowler
and that's a maiden from Vinay, once more Utseya can't find any gap in the off side, strikes the ball towards the man at point
length ball is defended to the off side
powered through the off side towards sweeper cover, it was wide outside off
towards midwicket for a single
length ball is punched towards point, straight to the fielder
flighted length ball on middle stump, towards mid-on for a single
tucks this towards fine leg to get two more
solidly defended off the front foot
length ball on off stump, as so many of Jadeja's deliveries seem to be, defended to the off side
helped along to towards sweeper cover
defended to the left of the bowler
pitched up and outside off, looking to chop that through the off side, he misses
defends down the track off the front foot
too wide from Mishra, slapped towards sweeper cover for a single
looks to push the ball towards the off side, an inside-edge towards midwicket
pitching on leg stump, defended down the track
wide down the leg side, looking for a quicker front of the hand delivery
there's the googly, tangles up the batsman, struck on the pads while on the backfoot, but that was sliding down
worked away to deep midwicket for a couple to end the over
defended towards cover off the front foot
more defence from Zimbabwe
on a length around off stump, forward defence to the off side
refer previous ball comms, Jadeja racing through the over
quicker one outside off, eased towards sweeper for a single
flighted delivery on the stump, blocked
sliding on to the pads, defended to the leg side
spinning away outside off, eased towards cover
full and outside off, carved towards sweeper cover for one more
length ball around off, blocked back towards the bowler
quicker and full, heading for middle, defended from the crease
short ball outside off, slapped towards sweeper cover
pitched up on middle stump and that is launched towards the long-on boundary
full and aiming for the toes, Chigumbura eases it towards long-on
full toss on the pads, clipped towards deep square leg
length ball on middle stump, defended to the legside
Vinay Kumar continues to get punished, a full toss is thrashed to the midwicket boundary
length ball on middle stump, clipped behind square leg for a single
shortish ball, Utseya top-edges it towards midwicket
short of length ball just outside off, nicely driven past cover for a couple
short and outside off, Utseya thinks about chasing after that one, but doesn't
short ball again, on middle and leg stump, gloved towards the fine leg boundary for four
short of length and outside off, driven towards Kohli at cover, sets off for the single though the non-striker doesn't respond, a direct hit and that was a run-out
loses his line badly, way outside off stump
short of length ball outside off, a waft at it, no contact
short of length and on off and middle, tapped towards cover
slower from Unadkat, on a length outside off, Chigumbura launches that over cover, not off the middle of the bat though
steered down to third man for a single
from round the wicket, on a length around off, driven towards mid-on
length ball around off stump, defended towards point
short ball is mowed down the ground, not the orthodox or elegant of shots, but does the business

at long last India have dismissed Chigumbura, the first time they have managed to do it in four innings, it was a back of a length ball that rose up outside off, nicked through to the keeper, Chigumbura's resistance is over
hits near the bottom of the bat as the batsman stays on the backfoot to a length ball, down to third man
backs away from the stumps and a top edge sends the ball over slips for four
short of length and outside off, that is powered past point for four more

full and heading for middle and leg, whipped away towards deep square leg, there's no one in that area, fine leg has to sprint across, the batsmen take three, the crowd roars it approval as Utseya reaches his half-century, Utseya enjoys the moment as well
backs away from the stumps and looks to thrash the ball, can't middle it
length ball is swatted towards long-on for a single
length ball outside edges that slower one towards third man, Jarvis was looking to blast that over long-on but was fooled by the slower delivery but manages to steer the ball to third man

there have been plenty of close shaves in this Zimbabwe innings, this is probably the closest, Utseya lashed the ball towards mid-off and set off for a single, a direct hit almost catches him short, he is inches inside the crease when the bails come off, the third umpire needs plenty of replays before taking the call
terrific delivery from Unadkat, homing in on the base of off stump, far too good for Jarvis, the stumps rattle, Jarvis is on his way
Unadkat gets another one, Brian Vitori has gone for a golden duck, looked to swipe that one to the leg side, he misses and again the stumps are disturbed

no hat-trick, no five-for, but this has a superb day for Unadkat, he finishes off with a length ball on off stump, resolutely defended down the track, Unadkat finishes with 4 for 41, India are 2-0 up after a 58-run victory
